channel.title: Politics on nRT
channel.description: Recent content in Politics on nRT

item.title: India's Undercurrent of Propaganda
item.description: India is currently at an interesting political standpoint. We finally have a single party forming the central government without needing support from other parties (last this happened was in 1984). The average Indian person seems to be much more aware and concerned about the political situation, and invested in the country’s future, especially young people. All of this is a major shift compared to a few years ago. There have been several contributing factors – dissatisfaction with the UPA govt.
